item.title: By: At the Heart | Grand Mighty
item.dc:creator: At the Heart | Grand Mighty
item.description: [...] maintain the cold-side piping as close to ambient as possible. So far after my driving reviews, the Defined Autoworks V-Mount is performing phenomenally well: both Intake and Engine temperatures are very consistent and low, a [...]
item.content:encoded: […] maintain the cold-side piping as close to ambient as possible. So far after my driving reviews, the Defined Autoworks V-Mount is performing phenomenally well: both Intake and Engine temperatures are very consistent and low, a […]

item.title: By: Dave
item.dc:creator: Dave
item.description: I have the Defined V-Mount on my single turbo FD, I can attest to how great of a performer it is. I don't recall ever seeing a water temp above 90*C, and IAT's are usually 3-5* above ambient. When my water/meth comes on, drastic reduction. Overheating is a thing of the past with a v-mount.
item.content:encoded: I have the Defined V-Mount on my single turbo FD, I can attest to how great of a performer it is. I don’t recall ever seeing a water temp above 90*C, and IAT’s are usually 3-5* above ambient. When my water/meth comes on, drastic reduction. Overheating is a thing of the past with a v-mount.

item.title: By: Eric
item.dc:creator: Eric
item.description:
In reply to <a href="https://grandmighty.github.io/grandmighty/2013/02/defined-autoworks-v-mount/#comment-54912">Kent</a>.
You got it, I'm interested in finding out as well. From other owners I've talked to, it seems like both IATs and water temps are very low, so we'll see!
item.content:encoded:
In reply to Kent.

You got it, I’m interested in finding out as well. From other owners I’ve talked to, it seems like both IATs and water temps are very low, so we’ll see!

item.title: By: Kent
item.dc:creator: Kent
item.description:
Once you get this beast running I'd be interested in some of your intake temps running this setup. I'd been eyeing this setup for my eventual single turbo as it's the best priced V-Mount setup out there.
Defined is fairly local to me and I've seen some of their cars in person. They do good work and their 20B P-Ports sound awesome. I'd expect no different from this setup.
item.content:encoded:
Once you get this beast running I’d be interested in some of your intake temps running this setup. I’d been eyeing this setup for my eventual single turbo as it’s the best priced V-Mount setup out there.

Defined is fairly local to me and I’ve seen some of their cars in person. They do good work and their 20B P-Ports sound awesome. I’d expect no different from this setup.
